channel.title: How Do i make myself owner?
channel.description: Well ive used nexon-scape source and ive had a lil go to try make myself owner how do i do it nexon-scape is a 667/714 server. please help ~~Knock~~

item.title: How Do i make myself owner?
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

hmmm usually you just go into player.java, and you should be able to search the owners name and change it to yours? or search for something like rights=2 in player.java if it still doesnt work then add this into your commands.java :

for admin :
[sup]if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“giveadmin”) && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“PUTYOURNAMEHERE”)) {
String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1);
Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username);
if (other == null)
return true;
other.setRights(2);
}[/sup]

for mod:
[sup]if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“givemod”) && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“PUTYOURNAMEHERE”)) {
String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1);
Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username);
if (other == null)
return true;
other.setRights(1);
}[/sup]

ok i found the code of what it should be like in player.java:
[sup] if (username.equalsIgnoreCase(“PUTYOURNAMEHERE”))
{
rights = 2;
}
}[/sup]
and change the rights to whatever rights you have in your server.
all done for you

Read full topic
item.source: How Do i make myself owner?

item.title: How Do i make myself owner?
item.dc:creator: @nickyyy nickyyy
item.description:
@nickyyy wrote:

Go into your charecter files, look for your name, and go to player rights = 0 and change it to = 2 or = 3 depending on your source, make sure you are logged out in the game, save the file and log back in, its that simple!

Read full topic
item.source: How Do i make myself owner?

item.title: How Do i make myself owner?
item.dc:creator: @PIEBAR2FAR PIEBAR2FAR
item.description:
@PIEBAR2FAR wrote:

you can’t make yourself owner, just make yourself admin, add a command that sets your rigts to 2 for normal players then do the command in game and then delete it, I’m sure there are easier ways to do this but thats the first one that comes to mind

Read full topic
